alert.note: Alert for Cloud; Republic; Washington (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 12 at 6:48PM CDT by NWS Topeka
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Republic, Washington and northeastern Cloud Counties through 730 PM CDT... At 648 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 5 miles northeast of Mahaska to 6 miles east of Agenda to near Clyde. Movement was northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Washington, Clyde, Clifton, Linn, Morrowville, Palmer, Haddam, Mahaska, Agenda, Vining and Hollenberg. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CDT for north central Kansas.
